line.comment: * if we can't find Outposts of the chosen faction we choose another
* we should just ignore docking restrictions for these because they always leave immediately again and cannot block docking ports

line.text: ' has maxed out its population with '

line.comment: * from Lib.DropWares, but this can also drop in a not owned station
* Let's assume the user doesn't want us to drop any missiles of the type currently selected.
* No more room at the station.
* all remaining refugee passengers add to the abstracted resource of the Nomad faction
